about_the_game:
Unravel the enigma of our hollow earth in this action packed Platformer Defense game. Play by yourself or collaborate with friends in local multiplayer.
The shadows hold secrets you'll never forget...
Build your base & blast your way through this nostalgia-inducing journey reminiscent of classic 80s and 90s Science Fiction movies.
Fight alongside your friends through couch-gaming local multiplayer as you help each other fight off the hordes of enemies, unlocking new technologies to help you along the way.

Build your Base
Each level has red crystals spread around which represent positions players can construct buildings or turrets. Players must choose wisely what to build and where as there are limited build spots and the enemy attack paths can turn out to be... unpredictable...


Harvest Resources
To accumelate resources, killing the enemy isn't enough. Players need to roam the map for chests to pick up which contain numerous random rewards. In addition blue crystals are spread around the map which players can harvest for funds.


Defend your Base
Your base is a lot more than just turrets: you can buy / upgrade weapons, items, and more!
Using a combination of weaponry and structures you need to defend your HQ from the enemy hordes until the end!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Version 18362.0 or higher
  • Processor: AMD Athlon X4 | Intel Core i5 4460
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 | AMD R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Version 18362.0 or higher
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 | Intel i5 Skylake
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 | AMD RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: In this Coop Platformer Defense game, you must defend your HQ from enemy hordes by building your base and defenses wisely, while you fight using weapons & items acquired and upgraded along the way.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
